ru.nsu.sumaneev.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.nsu.sumaneev.controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ListenersGetter

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements ListenersGetter
    Controller initializes resources and original UI also it is able to return listeners for View and its panels

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller()
      Initializes ModelController, ScoresTable and View
